dcterms:creator: Y. Li
Y. Zheng
S. Liu
Y. Chen
X. Shi
dcterms:description: A recently released realistic English to Chinese translation dataset, used to systematically evaluate compositional generalization in machine translation scenarios. It consists of a training set of 196,246 sentence pairs, a validation set, and a test set of 10,000 samples, including a dedicated synthetic test set with 10,800 sentences containing novel compounds.
dcterms:title: CoGnition

dcterms:description: A dataset automatically generated from a set of rules that tracks which rules and rule combinations of each example, designed to measure compositional generalization. It consists of three splits with maximum compound divergence while guaranteeing a small atom divergence between train and test sets.
dcterms:title: CFQ
